name: Tide-y Up
description:
This a game that was made for the UKIE Green Games Jam in 2019, by Valeriya Lakhtikova, William Sparkes, Asa Booth, Sally Jones and Maximilian Lock.

All of are student in Norwich University of the Arts and we have made this game to demonstrate the fact that todays oceans need cleaning and we wanted to demonstrate something proactive rathr than depressing, so in our game the player assumes the role of the turtle that has teamed up with Captain Beard. They have put their efforts together to make the oceans cleaner.
developers: We Didn't Come Up With a Name
